Minority_employment.long_description: Count of total employment for racial minority workers. Racial minority in this case is defined as Black alone, American Indian or Alaska Native alone, Asian alone, Hawaii and Pacific Islander alone, or Two or More Races.
Minority_employment.short_description: Total employment for racial minority workers (count)

sources.name: Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD)
sources.location: Origin-Destination Employment Statistics (LODES), Workplace Area Characteristics (WAC)

Minority_employment.statement: The number of jobs for racial minority workers in {features.name} is {value}.

Nonminority_employment.long_description: Count of total employment for racial non-minority workers. Non-minority in this case is defined as White alone.
Nonminority_employment.short_description: Total employment by racial non-minority workers (count)

sources.name: Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD)
sources.location: Origin-Destination Employment Statistics (LODES), Workplace Area Characteristics (WAC)

Nonminority_employment.statement: The number of jobs for racial non-minority workers in {features.name} is {value}.
